question: Which Indian sportswomen has attained the World No. 1 position in the women’s 10m air rifle event?
explanation: According to the latest rankings released by the International Shooting Sport Federation (ISSF), Indian shooting ace Apurvi Chandela from Jaipur has recently attained the world number 1 position in the women’s 10m air rifle event. Beside her, Anjum Moudgil also occupied the World No 2 spot in the same event to make it a one-two for India. Both the shooters  have already secured the 2020 Tokyo Olympics quotas for the country.
